timeline.message:
Fix flagging roundabout with Synthetic Node
https://github.com/osmlab/atlas-checks/issues/316

Unit Test for Synthetic Node flagging
https://github.com/osmlab/atlas-checks/issues/316

timeline.bodyText: Ah! I missed to add the comment! Please add this keyword here: this.isEdgeWithSyntheticBoundaryNode
timeline.author: sayas01
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -87,6 +91,14 @@ public boolean validCheckForObject(final AtlasObject object)
     protected Optional<CheckFlag> flag(final AtlasObject object)
     {
         final Set<String> instructions = new HashSet<>();
+
+        // Skip if roundabout contains synthetic node. bug fix:
+        // https://github.com/osmlab/atlas-checks/issues/316
+        if (isEdgeWithSyntheticBoundaryNode(object))

timeline.bodyText: This is not needed, unless sonar is throwing a fit. The object has already been verified to be an Edge in validCheckForObject.
timeline.author: Bentleysb
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -163,6 +175,21 @@ private boolean intersectsWithEnclosedGeometry(final Polygon polygon, final Edge
                         || polygon.fullyGeometricallyEncloses(polyline));
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Checks if {@link AtlasObject} contains synthetic boundary Node
+     * 
+     * @param object
+     * @return true if roundabout contains synthetic boundary Node.
+     */
+    private boolean isEdgeWithSyntheticBoundaryNode(final AtlasObject object)
+    {
+        return object instanceof Edge

timeline.bodyText: nit: could markAsFlagged() the object and the other edges picked up here to avoid reprocessing them
timeline.author: seancoulter

timeline.bodyText: Should we use the same constraints as validCheckForObject here? In that method we check !isExcludedHighway instead of HighwayTag.isCarNavigableHighway()
timeline.author: seancoulter
